Name: Archived
Description: Indicates whether the object has been archived.

Name: Author Email
Description: The email of the author who created or published the SMS.

Name: Author Name
Description: The name of the author who created or published the SMS.

Name: Campaign name
Description: The campaign name.

Name: Click rate
Description: The percentage of recipients who clicked a link in the SMS, out of those who received the SMS. Formula: Unique clicks / delivered * 100.

Name: Created by user ID
Description: The user who created this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Object create date/time
Description: The date and time at which this object was created. This value is automatically set by HubSpot and may not be modified.

Name: Delivered
Description: The number of SMS messages that got delivered.

Name: Delivered rate
Description: The percentage of SMS messages that got delivered.

Name: Not delivered
Description: The number of SMS messages that couldn’t be delivered, for example if a recipient’s SMS number was not found.

Name: Not delivered rate
Description: The percentage of SMS messages that couldn’t be delivered, for example if a recipient was not found.

Name: Not sent
Description: The number of SMS messages that couldn’t be sent, for example if a contact is not a marketing contact, or has unsubscribed from all messages.

Name: Generated by AI
Description: The content was fully generated by AI and was not edited by a human.

Name: Co-created with AI
Description: The content was generated by AI and then edited by a human.

Name: Object last modified date/time
Description: Most recent timestamp of any property update for this object. This includes HubSpot internal properties, which can be visible or hidden. This property is updated automatically.

Name: Merged record IDs
Description: The list of record IDs that have been merged into this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: SMS name
Description: The internal name of the marketing SMS.

Name: Record ID
Description: The unique ID for this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Record source detail 1
Description: First level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source detail 2
Description: Second level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source detail 3
Description: Third level of detail on how this record was created.

Name: Record source
Description: How this record was created.

Name: Publish/send date
Description: The date/time at which the SMS will get sent out (if scheduled) or has been sent out (if already sent).

Name: Publish status
Description: This shows if an SMS is published, scheduled, or in draft.

Name: Published by email
Description: The email of the user who published the SMS.

Name: Published By Name
Description: Specifies the name of the person who published the SMS.

Name: Sent
Description: The number of SMS messages sent.

Name: Sending method
Description: Specifies the sending method of a SMS message.
Options: Regular (BATCH); Regular A/B (BATCH_AB); Time zone (LOCALTIME); Automated (AUTOMATED); Automated A/B (AUTOMATED_AB)

Name: Marketing SMS State
Description: State of the Marketing SMS.
Options: Draft (DRAFT) [READ-ONLY]; Scheduled (SCHEDULED) [READ-ONLY]; Pre-Processing (PRE_PROCESSING) [READ-ONLY]; Processing (PROCESSING) [READ-ONLY]; Sent (SENT) [READ-ONLY]; Automated Draft (AUTOMATED_DRAFT); Published Automated (AUTOMATED); Error (ERROR)

Name: Subcategory
Description: The subcategory of the marketing SMS.
Options: Batch (batch); Localtime (localtime); AB Master (ab_master); AB Variant (ab_variant); AB Loser Variant (ab_loser_variant); Automated (automated); Automated AB Master (automated_ab_master); Automated AB Variant (automated_ab_variant); Automated AB Loser Variant (automated_ab_loser_variant)

Name: Total clicks
Description: The number of times a link in the SMS got clicked.

Name: Unique clicks
Description: The number of recipients who clicked a link in the SMS.

Name: Updated date
Description: The date and time at which the SMS was last updated.

Name: Updated by user ID
Description: The user who last updated this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Owner assigned date
Description: The most recent timestamp of when an owner was assigned to this record. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Owner
Description: The owner of the object.

Name: Owner's main team
Description: The main team of the record owner. This value is set automatically by HubSpot.

Name: Talking Points
Options: America Prays 250; NRB 2026; PRAY Science (Pray Science)
